name: Button Cat Fantastic: Sign Extravaganza Time
name_original: Button Cat Fantastic: Sign Extravaganza Time
description:
Challenge an adversary to a family friendly duel of time estimation. Sensei Button Cat will guide you both to enlightenment. There is no need to fight, yet winner takes it all.

Controls

A to press left button
L to press right button

Tutorial included

Developers comments

Had to work quick. The programming side was done in mere few hours so enough time was left for graphics, polish and even audio! A friendo helped with the idea and the near authentic meows, I did the less authentic ones.

Made in 13 hours for Alakajam 6, 2019, with Godot.

Font: Hiroshio by Em Nazar
